chunks.title: Regulation 1 - Name of regulations These regulations are the Taxation (Government Business Enterprises) Regulations 2003.
chunks.main_structural_heading: Name of regulations These regulations are the Taxation (Government Business Enterprises) Regulations 2003.

chunks.title: Regulation 2 - Commencement These regulations are taken to have commenced on 1 July 2002.
chunks.main_structural_heading: Commencement These regulations are taken to have commenced on 1 July 2002.

chunks.title: Regulation 3 - Territory entities subject to national tax equivalent regime--Act, s 6 The following Territory entities are prescribed: o ACTEW Corporation Limited
chunks.main_structural_heading: Territory entities subject to national tax equivalent regime--Act, s 6 The following Territory entities are prescribed: o ACTEW Corporation Limited
chunks.text:
o      ACTEW Distribution Limited
               o      ACTEW Retail Limited
               o      ACTEW Investments Pty Limited
               o      ACTEW China Pty Limited
               o      ACT Forests
               o      ACTION Authority
               o      ACTTAB Limited
               o      Totalcare Industries Limited.
TAXATION (GOVERNMENT BUSINESS ENTERPRISES) REGULATIONS 2003 (NO 10 OF 2003)

TAXATION (GOVERNMENT BUSINESS ENTERPRISES) REGULATIONS 2003 (NO 10 OF 2003)

chunks.title: Regulation 5 - Application of regulation 4
chunks.text:
(1)     Before the commencement of the Cemeteries and Crematoria Act
2003, section 18, regulation 4 applies as if the reference in that
regulation to The Australian Capital Territory Public Cemeteries Board were a
reference to The Trustees of the Canberra Public Cemeteries.
     (2)     This section expires on the commencement of the Cemeteries and
Crematoria Act 2003, section 18.
TAXATION (GOVERNMENT BUSINESS ENTERPRISES) REGULATIONS 2003 (NO 10 OF 2003)
